items.title: First Tick: Here are the top global cues for today’s trade
items.description:
Gold eased after a three-day gain, before pivotal US jobs data due later Thursday that may shape the
outlook for the Federal Reserve’s monetary easing path.

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade Nykaa, Amber Enterprises, JSW Steel, UltraTech Cement, Gujarat Gas, Lupin, and others on July 3?
items.description: The consolidation is expected to continue until the frontline indices decisively surpass their recent swing highs. Below are some short-term trading ideas to consider.

items.title: Gainers & Losers: Stocks that moved the most on July 3
items.description: Gainers & Losers: After opening higher in the green, bulls failed to hold control as bears pounced during the day. Benchmark indices closed in the red, erasing all losses recorded in the morning.

items.title: Taking Stock: Market fails to build on gains; Nifty closes at 25,400, Sensex down 170 pts
items.description: Apollo Hospitals, Hero MotoCorp, Dr Reddy's Labs, ONGC, Maruti Suzuki were among major gainers on the Nifty, while losers were SBI Life Insurance, Kotak Mahindra Bank, Bajaj Finance, JSW Steel, Bajaj Finserv.

items.title: Live: Nifty extends loss for second day amid expiry-driven swings | Closing Bell
items.description:
Sensex, Nifty Slip For The Second Day. Expiry Fuels Volatile Swings In Market. Mid, Smallcap Indices Buck Market Trend. Media, Pharma Stocks Fare Better. Financials Continue To Underperform. Nifty Realty Extends Loss For Sixth Day. Nifty 50 Gainers: Apollo Hospital, Hero Moto, DRL. Nifty 50 Losers: Sbi Life, Kotak Bank, Bajaj Finance
Nandita Khemka and Lovisha Darad break down the market action and share stocks on their radar.

items.title: Auto, pharma stocks rally up to 6% amid US-India trade deal optimism
items.description: Nifty Pharma index has extended gains for the 10th consecutive session. Nifty Auto index meanwhile extended gains for the third straight day.

items.title: Kilitch Drugs eyes Rs 1,000 crore revenue with Khopoli expansion regulated market entry
items.description: Mehta said that the Khopoli plant will enable exports to regulated markets starting FY28–29, bringing previously outsourced products in-house saving costs, and expanding the product portfolio, which will include injectables, eye drops, and chronic therapies.

items.title: Nifty 50 Top Gainers: Hero Motocorp, Apollo Hospital, Maruti Suzuki Stocks Lead in Today's Trading Session
items.description: The NIFTY 50's top gainers include Hero Motocorp, Apollo Hospital, Maruti Suzuki, ONGC and Dr Reddys Labs, with gains of 2.06%, 1.59%, 1.32%, 1.27% and 1.09% respectively.

items.title: Infosys shares climb nearly 1% today in intraday trading
items.description: With the current price at Rs 1,625.30, Infosys shows a positive trend supported by strong financials and market sentiment.

items.title: Kotak Mahindra Bank shares drop up to 2% on Macquarie downgrade
items.description: Macquarie, in its latest note, downgraded Kotak Mahindra Bank to ‘neutral’ but raised the target price to Rs 2,300.

items.title: SpiceJet shares rise 3% as airline receives first two overhauled engines, ungrounds another Boeing 737 NG
items.description: SpiceJet received the first two of its 17 overhauled engines from international MRO provider StandardAero. These include one CFM LEAP‐1B engine, that powers the Boeing 737 MAX planes, and one Q400 engine.

items.description: With a marginal increase in today's session, Larsen & Toubro's stock reflects the company's consistent financial growth and very bullish market sentiment.

items.description: With the stock's current price at Rs 2,030.90, investors are closely monitoring Bharti Airtel's performance in the context of its recent financials and prevailing market conditions.
